text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, keh… 
Stop thinking… I need to stop thinking about it!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I have to keep going! I have to move… 
With effort and determination, I need to go forth!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Just like dad… 
Straight ahead, with a resolute heart… I have to run!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…I can't stop thinking about it… No, I can't 
cast it aside. This… murky feeling.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Wah!? 
T-Trainer!? Why are you here!?
I was thinking that I had to talk to her, but I was lucky to come across her on my morning run.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Running… right. I guess you're physically-minded too. 
You're amazing, working so hard…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Ha ha. In what way? 
I feel like I'm running in circles here.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, no progress at all.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: My mental's deteriorating and my form's falling apart… I can't focus. Even if I do the basics everyday, it doesn't amount to much.
choice_data_list: Is that because… of that "murky feeling"?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah! W-what I just said… that was… 
No, it wasn't anything important…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…… Well… no matter what I do… 
There's something inside me that I… don't need… so…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Ah. A ha ha. I don't know what that's supposed to mean. What am I even saying…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Please forget what I just—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh?
The mind and body are linked together. Of course that would have an influence on her running. Also… after seeing that scene go down, her running has changed.
It looks like she was in pain and that she was enduring it, like she was holding back… something inside her—— That's how she ran.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Trainer…
If I put together her words, expressions, and running… I can make a guess, and it's that she's very conscious of Orfevre.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
T-that's not… she ain't got a thing to do with this! 
Nothing at all, I'm—!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I'm…
"Why is she being brought up", I felt like those words summed up the emotions in her heart. She probably was holding some type of grudge towards Orfevre—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …These murky feelings… I know I can't get hung up on it and that I have to throw away this feeling. And yet, you still noticed it…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
But, I don't want to admit it. I can't admit it. 
This… black and murky feeling… I just can't.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Every time, she glimmers at the top. 
…A lot of people… pay attention to her, watch her.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Even if I run by myself, no matter where I go she's there.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …These pent up feelings… they've been twisting and turning in my stomach. Even if I try to ignore them, they just get keep getting heavier…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I can't… get better at running.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I shouldn't think about it. 
This awful feeling… I shouldn't have it at all.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I want to aim for my dream, among these pretty things… just like my father.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I wonder how much I told you.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
My father was a pro ballet dancer. In those plays… 
he aimed for the role of principal alongside his partner, friend and rival.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
"Because he was there, I was able to push myself" 
…That was something he often said.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I… admired that.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
A friendly rivalry and by refining his skills… 
He was able to obtain it, the role of principal.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …It was beautiful, it was the most glorious existence.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
And yet, I… inside of me is this dark and murky feeling… 
It isn't pure in the slightest.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Trainer, I'm sorry. 
You must be disgusted… by me.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh… but I…

I looked at her quizzically, as I replied in an instant. 
And to that, she returned with her own look of confusion.
Inside her was a— strong jealousy. The thing she yearned for, the existence that was closest to her dream, was Orfevre.
So that's why anything involving Orfevre makes her think of these murky feelings.
…Actually, is that really the case?
choice_data_list: It's not a good thing, but—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Trainer?

Is it really only a bad thing? 
or maybe—
choice_data_list: Do you want to check it?

text_block_list.text:
Her feelings might carry something completely 
different, but I decided to have her confirm it.
